text.div: "Wardlaw 2014 Analysis 1.16.3 Evidence set" is a grouping of six Evidence results used in a meta-analysis.

relatedArtifact.label: Wardlaw 2014
relatedArtifact.citation: Wardlaw JM, Murray V, Berge E, del Zoppo GJ. Thrombolysis for acute ischaemic stroke. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2014 Jul 29(7):CD000213. PMID 25072528

note.text: Short names for Evidence sources are detailed in 'References to studies included in this review'
